mission: Supporting student mental wellness through accessible, organized, and stress-free counseling services. Providing a safe, supportive, and confidential environment.

key_features.name: Easy Scheduling
key_features.description: Book counseling appointments online by choosing preferred time slots with instant confirmation.

key_features.name: Private Inquiries
key_features.description: Submit confidential questions or concerns. Responses usually within 1–2 school days.

key_features.name: History Monitoring
key_features.description: Track counseling journey, session history, progress notes, and wellness recommendations.

process_steps: 1. Create Account: Sign up with school credentials.
2. Choose Schedule: Select date and time from available slots.
3. Intake Form: Fill out a brief form to help the counselor prepare.
4. Attend Session: Meet with the counselor.

counselor_info.confidentiality: 100% Confidential. Only authorized guidance personnel can access records.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How do I book an appointment?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Go to the Student Dashboard, select 'Book Appointment', fill in the reason (Academic, Personal, Career, Mental Wellness), choose Session Type (In-Person or Online), pick a date and time, and submit.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Is this for emergencies?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: No. For urgent help, contact school authorities or local emergency hotlines immediately.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Who can see my records?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Only authorized guidance personnel and required admins can access counseling-related records.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How do I cancel or reschedule?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: You can manage your appointments through the Dashboard. Please cancel or reschedule as early as possible.

dashboard_features.profile: Update full name, student number, year level, program, and contact info.
dashboard_features.history: View sessions completed and overall improvement stats calculated by the counselor.
dashboard_features.inquiry_history: Track sent messages and counselor responses.
